text: Netizens are eager to learn more about Adam Lambert’s boyfriend. Lambert is a Grammy-nominated vocalist and songwriter who first rose to fame as the runner-up on American Idol Season 8. Since then, he has released numerous chart-topping tracks and albums and has also appeared in various movies and television shows. Some of his most memorable songs include Whataya Want from Me, Trespassing, Ghost Town, and many more. Here’s everything we know about Adam Lambert’s boyfriend, his professional background, and more. Who is Adam Lambert dating? Adam Lambert is dating Oliver Gliese. Gliese currently resides in West Hollywood but was born and raised in Denmark. He completed the International Business Baccalaureate course at Niels Brock before pursuing a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration and Project Management at the prestigious Copenhagen Business School. What is Oliver Gliese’s job? Oliver Gliese works in the fashion industry. After graduating from college, Gliese began building his career in the industry and has worked with several renowned companies, according to his official LinkedIn page. From 2017 to 2019, he served as Head of Office Management at the popular Danish fashion brand Ganni. He rejoined the company in 2022 as a client advisor, working there for a year. Additionally, Gliese was also part of the non-profit organization Global Fashion Agenda, where he served as both Innovation Forum Coordinator and Partnerships Manager. Adam Lambert and Oliver Gliese’s relationship history Adam Lambert and Oliver Gliese have yet to share details on when and how they started dating. However, several sources speculate that the pair got together in 2020 when they were spotted enjoying a romantic moment in Mexico. The couple went Instagram official in May 2021 when Lambert shared a picture with Gliese. Since then, they have been going strong, and Gliese has been an inspiration for several of Lambert’s recent songs. The American Idol star has also defended his partner against homophobic slurs that flooded his Instagram for a while. In response to the negativity, Lambert proudly stated: “He is beautiful and brave and daring. One of the many things I love about him! We are very happy together, and if the haters don’t like it, we don’t really give a f***.”
